document_data.name: Gaskur
document_data.mainbody: '''Gaskur''' was a bodyguard and servant to [[Marlin Stormserpent]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: He was not one to second-guess his master.
document_data.Possessions: Gaskur was not known to own any property.
document_data.Activities: Gaskur did all that Marlin required of him, and being a bodyguard was only a small part of his service.
document_data.Relationships: He worked for [[Marlin Stormserpent]].{{cite book/Elminster Must Die/MMP|237-238|23}} As far as Marlin knew, he had no kin nor family in [[Suzail]], but actually he had nieces, and these nieces had cats.
